full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS TSE YI LHA GSUM LA BRTEN NAS RANG GZHAN GYI DON DU TSE'I DNGOS GRUB SGRUB PA'I TSUL 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI'I MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B (CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS TSE YI LHA GSUM LA BRTEN PA RANG GZHAN DON DU TSE'I DNGOS GRUB PA'I TSUL 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI'I @019A *, ,MCHOG SBYIN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO TSE MCHOG GLING GI TSOGS 'DON DU 'DZUGS MCHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, DAD LDAN RDZAS SANG HUR TSA PA LIG THU DGE SLONG LCAM SRING SKYABS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG GA-YUNG DRUNG KYIS DAM PA GONG MA'I GSUNG BZHIN DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSKUL BA PO NYID KYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG, 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA'I DBANG PO BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYI MDO SNGAGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DZA YAN TU,, ,,)
